name: Search Member of organization via UI
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization via **API**.
- Signup `third user`.
- Invite `third user` to organization via **API**.

### Verify that:

- User can search organization members using `Search` field.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization via API.
  • Signup third user.
  • Invite third user to organization via API.

Verify that:

  • User can search organization members using Search field.

testStage.description:

- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization via **API**.

- User can search organization members using `Search` field.
